trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration> class is a <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection> collection of all protected-configuration providers available to your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A>屬性<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration>類別是<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection>所有受保護的組態提供者應用程式可以使用的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can encrypt sections of a configuration file to protect sensitive information used by your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加密組態檔來保護您的應用程式所使用的敏感資訊的區段。

trans-unit.source: This improves security by making unauthorized access difficult, even if an attacker gains access to your configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這可以改善安全性讓未經授權的存取變得困難，即使攻擊者取得組態檔的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes two protected configuration providers that can be used to encrypt sections of a configuration file: the <xref:System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider> class, which uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class to encrypt configuration sections, and the <xref:System.Configuration.DpapiProtectedConfigurationProvider> class, which uses the Windows Data Protection API (DPAPI) to encrypt configuration sections.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包含兩個受保護的組態提供者，可以用來加密組態檔的區段：<xref:System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider>類別，它會使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>類別來加密組態區段和<xref:System.Configuration.DpapiProtectedConfigurationProvider>類別，其中使用 Windows 資料保護 API (DPAPI) 來加密組態區段。

trans-unit.source: You might have a requirement to encrypt sensitive information using an algorithm other than the RSA or DPAPI providers.
trans-unit.target: 您可能需要使用 RSA 或 DPAPI 的提供者以外的演算法的重要資訊加密。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can build your own custom protected-configuration provider.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您可以建立您自己自訂的受保護的組態提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider> class is an abstract base class that you must inherit from to create your own protected-configuration provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider>類別是您必須建立自己的受保護的組態提供者繼承自抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about protected configuration, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1).
trans-unit.target: 如需受保護的組態的詳細資訊，請參閱[加密組態資訊使用受保護的組態](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection" /> class using default settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection.%23ctor%2A>建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A>屬性<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="provider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="provider" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="provider" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="provider" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> object to add already exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件已經存在於集合中。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 集合是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> object in the collection with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中具有指定之名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> object with the specified name, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no object with that name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider" /> 物件，如果沒有任何物件使用這個名稱，則為 <see langword="null" />。
